name: PHYS 251
title: Group Theory and Modern Physics
description: Finite and continuous groups, group representation theory, the symmetric group and Young tableaux, Lie groups and Lie algebras, irreducible representations of Lie algebras by tensor methods, unitary groups in particle physics, Dynkin diagrams, Lorentz and Poincaré groups.

pre_req_data.text: Enrollment is restricted to graduate students only, except by permission of instructor.
